title: Hey pixel pushers, check this out.
author: kraftie

comments.content:
I did something similar about two years ago in flash:   
 [http://www.become.co.uk/ico16.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011083101/http:/www.become.co.uk/ico16.html)   
for creating the then amazing favicons.   
(Only 16\*16 works for favicons, and they have to have a non-transparent background).   
Matthew
